channel.title: Need a Devoted Mentor!
channel.description:
I'm devoted to accomplishing what I've started, I ask tons of questions, and I'm pretty sure this topic is in the wrong section. To be honest, there's no section for this topic to be posted, so it's in the Server Help section because that's basically what I'm asking for.
I need a Mentor that can help me with some basic questions, and will teach me a few basics in java programming when working with RSPS'.
I know how to modify things (create commands, npcs, change specs, , customize), but I'd like to create my own Mini-Game or add in a 666 model into a 317 private server. I don't know how to add models onto my server. I don't even know how to host it with no-ip, only run the server on 127.0.0.1 "home sweet home."
So, check this website out: "http://typewith.me/p/learning2java" We could meet there and you can save code, add code, and type in code with a chatbox beside it so you can talk to each other. You just go to the website, make your username, and you can add code and I will be able to see it live.
[img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/8210/learning2java.png[/img]
Send me a PM if you're interested, I really am eager to learn new things.

This isn’t the type of help you can request here.

item.title: Need a Devoted Mentor!
item.dc:creator: @Flamo353 Flamo353
item.description:
@Flamo353 wrote:

This has to be like a real teaching session, where we get a server to start off with it, I’ll show what I know, maybe 3 days a week or something, more or less depending on what you choose. It’s supposed to be like you’re the teacher, and we meet online certain time(s)/day(s) of the week. You have to send me a PM if you’re interested.

Read full topic
